summary: Alyssa is a nice looking follower added to the nexus by request.
descriptionHtml:
Alyssa is a nice looking follower added to the nexus by request.  She has a fair skill set, mostly with the onehanded weapons and such. I wont go into detail, but if you want you can see for yourself.
https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5p1X4-Y_SN0/UKmMRSWgQSI/AAAAAAAAAAk/F4jR5hI9jUE/s1152/Skyrim%2520high%2520res.jpg 

The armor in the picture is not included in the mod, as it is not mine. It is the Amidianborn elven armor.
author: LEGENDARY AFFLICTION
